Define Documentation

#define GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD (  variable,
area,
groupField   ) 
 

Value:

KeyStrokeField * variable; \
   if ((variable = new KeyStrokeField) == NULL) \
      throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
   if (area != NULL) \
      ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
   if (groupField != NULL) \
      ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable);
